projects.title: ChaxApp
projects.description: A simple chat application where we can chat with our friends in real time with less latency and change your dp and use stickers and even more.

projects.title: Octoviz
projects.description: GitHub profile analyzer that takes a username and visualizes key insights. It showcases activity trends, contribution history, and language usage. The tool also highlights code style patterns and repository stats. Perfect for understanding a developer's GitHub footprint at a glance.
